Title: The Garveys at Their Best
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Kath Lingenfelter, Damon Lindelof
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Liv Tyler
Plot: Kevin tries to suppress his bad habits while tracking down a marauding deer in Mapleton. Laurie receives not-unexpected news amidst a rising sense of foreboding.
